title: DDFP 347: Mock draft special
itunes:title: DDFP 347: Mock draft special
description:
Shek is joined by Ike Taylor, Bucky Brooks and Handsome for the 2015 #DDFP Mock Draft (15:15). Plus, Ike discusses why Steve Smith was the toughest wide receiver to cover, Calvin Johnson's greatness and who the Steelers should draft to replace him (69:58). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
